Typography

Paragraph

Spirit. The non-physical part of a person which is the seat of emotions and character; the soul. The non-physical part of a person regarded as their true self and as capable of surviving physical death or separation. The non-physical part of a person manifested as an apparition after their death; a ghost. A supernatural being.
